      static CryptoModuleParameters CryptoModuleFactory.fillParamsObjectFromStringMap(CryptoModuleParameters params, Map<String,String> cryptoOpts) 
      CryptoModuleParameters DefaultCryptoModule.generateNewRandomSessionKey(CryptoModuleParameters params) 
      CryptoModuleParameters CryptoModule.generateNewRandomSessionKey(CryptoModuleParameters params)
      Generates a random session key and sets it into the getPlaintextKey() property.
      CryptoModuleParameters DefaultCryptoModule.getDecryptingInputStream(CryptoModuleParameters params) 
      CryptoModuleParameters CryptoModule.getDecryptingInputStream(CryptoModuleParameters params)
      Takes a CryptoModuleParameters object containing an InputStream to wrap within a CipherInputStream.
      CryptoModuleParameters DefaultCryptoModule.getEncryptingOutputStream(CryptoModuleParameters params) 
      CryptoModuleParameters CryptoModule.getEncryptingOutputStream(CryptoModuleParameters params)
      Takes a CryptoModuleParameters object containing an OutputStream to wrap within a CipherOutputStream.
      CryptoModuleParameters DefaultCryptoModule.initializeCipher(CryptoModuleParameters params) 
      CryptoModuleParameters CryptoModule.initializeCipher(CryptoModuleParameters params)
      Generates a Cipher object based on the parameters in the given CryptoModuleParameters object and places it into the getCipher() property.
